description: I have been working with mobile and frontend application development since 2021, contributing to companies across various sectors such as healthcare, business management, and currently one of Brazil’s largest delivery platforms. I focus on code quality, user experience, and product impact. I'm constantly seeking to grow technically, take on leadership roles, and expand my career internationally.

apps.trainTimeDescription: Take control of your workouts with a powerful interval timer that keeps you focused and motivated from start to finish. Whether you’re running, walking, or training with custom rounds, this app makes sure you never lose track of time — even when your screen is off.
apps.trainTimePrivacyPolicy:
Train Timer respects your privacy.
This app does not collect, store, or share any personal data from its users.
The app only uses device features such as notifications, vibration, and sounds, strictly for timer functionality. No user information is sent to external servers or used for any other purpose.

Changes to this policy: We may update this policy occasionally. Any changes will be reflected on this page.

If you have questions about this policy, please contact the developer via the email provided on the Play Store.
